Package org.apache.storm.nimbus

Class LeaderListenerCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.nimbus.LeaderListenerCallback
  • public class LeaderListenerCallback
extends Object
    A callback function when nimbus gains leadership.
